Author: levelupgirl
Text: This is only sorta related, but soda addiction is real for me. I used to buy two liters of Coke Zero and get super baked and just sip it all night. Unreasonable amounts of caffeine and THC make video games really fun but everything else terrible. If I got hungry I just drank more coke, and then when I got too jittery I smoked more weed. It was semi effective, but definitely not worth the physical pain that came after. Yikes.
